trans-unit.source: Represents an item (row) in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um item (linha) em um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: A DataGridItem object represents an item (row) in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, such as a heading section, a footer section, or a data row.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto DataGridItem representa um item (linha) em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle, como uma linha de dados, uma seção de rodapé ou uma seção de cabeçalho.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The data items of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control are stored in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> collection that can be accessed by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Os itens de dados de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle são armazenados em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>coleção pode ser acessada usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: You can use a DataGridItem object to programmatically access the properties of an item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar um objeto DataGridItem para acessar de forma programática as propriedades de um item em uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar e inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*> collection in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice do item a partir de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*>coleção no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The index number of the item, from the bound data source, that appears in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O número de índice do item da fonte de dados associado, que aparece no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data item represented by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os dados de item representados pelo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> objeto o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataItem property to specify or determine the properties of a data item represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade de item de dados para especificar ou determinar as propriedades de dados de item representado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade se aplica apenas a itens de dados no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A> property must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A>propriedade deve ser definida como `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, ou `ListItemType.EditItem`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that represents a data item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> que representa um item de dados no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object from the bound data source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> objeto da fonte de dados associada.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataSetIndex property to get the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object from the bound data source.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade DataSetIndex para obter o índice do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>objeto da fonte de dados associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade se aplica apenas a itens de dados no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>objeto deve ser definido como `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, ou `ListItemType.EditItem`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> from the bound data source.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> da fonte de dados associada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> de objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*>coleção do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Use the ItemIndex property to determine the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade ItemIndex para determinar o índice do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>de objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items%2A>coleção do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa propriedade se aplica apenas a itens de dados no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>objeto deve ser definido como `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, ou `ListItemType.EditItem`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*>coleção do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the item represented by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo do item representado pelo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> objeto o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Use the ItemType property to determine the type of an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade ItemType para determinar o tipo de um item de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the various item types.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista os vários tipos de item.

trans-unit.source: |Item Type|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Header`|The heading section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`Footer`|The footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`Item`|An item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`AlternatingItem`|An alternating item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`SelectedItem`|The selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`EditItem`|The item selected for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`Separator`|A separator between the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |`Pager`|The page selection section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.|
trans-unit.target: | Tipo de item | Descrição | |---------------|-----------------| | `Header`| A seção de cabeçalho do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>. | | `Footer`| A seção de rodapé do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>. | | `Item`| Um item no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>. | | `AlternatingItem`| Um item de alternância no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>. | | `SelectedItem`| O item selecionado no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>. | | `EditItem`| O item selecionado para edição no controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>. | | `Separator`| Um separador entre os itens do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>. | | `Pager`| Seção da página seleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.target: Usado internamente pelo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.target: A origem do evento.

trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>objeto que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o evento foi cancelado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Usado internamente pelo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref> da fonte de dados associada.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
